settings.heading: Full-Time Student Program
settings.row_content:
Drop your pup off at school! This new service gives us the opportunity to give our community a safe, clean & trustworthy place
to send their dogs for a full day of structured socialization, obedience
& enrichment. Our new facility offers many new amenities such as
multiple socialization areas, all levels of distraction for proofing
your pups skills, a stream to adventure through, 4 acres of trails to hike & much more!

Each pup will relax in their own kennel suite to enjoy any down time, snack/lunch time, & water breaks.

This service requires owners to pick up & drop off their pups at
our facility. There is a two day minimum. There is a cancellation fee
for less than 24 hours notice.

Drop Off Times:7 - 9amPick Up Times:4 - 6pmOne day:$4810 Day Package:$480

*** If you have 2 pups & they can share a kennel, it’s only $20 per second dog!

settings.heading: Village Walks
settings.row_content:
$42 per walk (Poop bags and toys included!)

Our Structure Walking Program is back and we couldn't be more thrilled! Structured Walks are a one hour walk with one of our canine handlers working on reality based dog training in the village of Scotia. This is a pick up and drop off service. Your assigned handler will come right to you and your pup! How convenient is that? In this program your pup(s) learn basic and intermediate obedience. This service does not work on any behavioral issues. This service is available Monday - Thursday only between 7 - 4 depending on availability.

* Only available within a 5 minute driving radius of 138 Albermarle Rd in Scotia

settings.heading: More Info
settings.row_content:
At Personal Paws, we aim to give you the peace of mind you need while you’re away. Here, your pup is in the best hands. We treat each
dog in our care as if they were our own, and that is what we kept in mind when designing our condos & packages.

Our awesome facility offers many new amenities such as multiple socialization areas, all levels of distraction for proofing your pups skills, a stream & pond to adventure through, 4 acres of trails to hike & much more!

settings.heading: Basic Boarding Package - $45 per day
settings.row_content:
This package includes:

Endless Potty Breaks

1 Walk Per Day

Bedtime Biscuit

*** If you have 2 pups & they can share a kennel, it’s only $20 per second dog!

settings.heading: Luxury Boarding Package - $65 per day
settings.row_content:
This package includes:

2 Walks Per Day

Endless Potty Breaks

Max Hour of Socialization Per Day

Large Luxury Kennel

*** If you have 2 pups & they can share a kennel, it’s only $20 per second dog!

settings.heading: Ultimate Luxury Boarding Package - $80 per day
settings.row_content:
This package includes:

2 Walks Per Day

Socialization

Work on Basic Fundamentals

1 Frozen Kong Per Day

Endless Potty Breaks

Large Luxury Condo

*** This package does not qualify for the shared kennel discount, since it is already packed with extras!

settings.heading: More Info
settings.row_content:
Our one on one training takes place at our facility in Rotterdam, NY with trainer Olivia! (Kait will still be conducting the behavioral modification training)

We offer four different levels of training, starting at $75 per session.

Consultation Fee - $30

Puppy Conditioning - $75 for one hour

Basic Obedience - $75 for one hour

Intermediate Obedience - $80 for one hour

E-Collar Training - $95 for one hour

Behavioral Modification - $100 - $110

Sign up for your consultation today!

*** Minimum of 4 training sessions required

settings.heading: More Info
settings.row_content:
Our Boarding School Options Include:

Stay & Train

Puppy Foundations

Rehab Retreat

Each program includes a Virtual Progress Pupdate to set you up for success once your pup leaves our care.

We curated each of these different Boarding School Programs to fit the needs of each individual dog. Our goal with every dog is to create well-rounded individuals. We want to give both you & your pup the education + skills to grow & flourish together. All boarding options require 48 hours cancellation notice or a fee will be incurred.

Drop off and pickup:

Monday - Friday: 7am - 9am or 4pm - 6pm

Weekends: Strictly 8am or 4pm

settings.heading: Puppy Foundations
settings.row_content:
This 2 week Board & Train is: $1800 total for the full stay.

This course is the basic foundation for your pup, including basic
obedience, proper socialization & manners for puppies aged 5mos-10mos old with no behaviors.

Includes:

Training Tools

Long Line

Place Command

Treat Pouch

Midway Virtual Progress Pupdate

What your puppy will learn:

Skills

Potty training

Kennel/Crate training

On-leash obedience

Stopping behaviors like mouthing and chewing

Socialization with other dogs, people, objects, sounds, and much more.

settings.heading: Stay & Train
settings.row_content:
This 4 - 6 week Board & Train is:

$3800 total for the full stay.

This course is for dogs 10 months & up with no behaviors,
looking to proof the basic foundational skills and become a well rounded individual. Training is conducted by either Olivia or Kait.

* Minimum of 4 weeks required
